introductions: I want this case finished more than you, detective.  Wine sales are declining. ||| Officially, Green Wine is completely at your disposal, more or less. ||| Just keep it brief.  I don't have time for you to chew the fat.
openers: I assume it's important if you're bothering me at this time, detective?
I hope you've made progress, detective. ||| Because if you haven't, then I'd have to convince the mayor to replace you.
What can I do to help, detective?  You look like you need it.
closers: You have some things to think about.
